channel.title: {project insanity} lunar makes me disconect?
channel.description:
when i click on lunar altar to change spellbooks just disconects me from game and i get this error message in the cmd:
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8277) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1896) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
if anybody helps me fix this via teamviewer or any other way message me on msn msn burnleyladz@hotmail.co.uk or on here i will give rsbot with about 15 scripts on it and i will co-owner or admin on my server.

item.title: {project insanity} lunar makes me disconect?
item.dc:creator: @deathscapepkz deathscapepkz
item.description:
@deathscapepkz wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:6, topic:365955”]why do people want lunar so badly?
the only thing that’s usefull to it is vengeance which can be easily added into the normal spellbook…[/quote]

then the spellbook would be overpowered probs with tb + entangle + veng.
